recipesJson.name: Pistachio Pudding Cup  (Green Joy)
recipesJson.author: NonStopMix
recipesJson.description:
This is an "instant" style pudding and if you like pistachio, it will put a smile on your face. I've been going thru bottles like I'm drinking the juice.

Sweeten to your liking.

VG/PG: 70/30

Steep: 3-5 days (it's very good right after mixing)

Developed in the Reload S RDA with N80 (quad core fused clapton) around 0.3 ohms at 40-60 watts. 

If you mix it, please leave a review.
